<style>
:root {
  --theme-main: #2b864b;
  --theme-bg: #f5f6fa;
  --theme-card-bg: #fff;
  --theme-card-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(43,134,75,0.10);
  --theme-border: #e3e7ed;
}

body {
  background: var(--theme-bg);
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

.quarto-title-block,
.quarto-title {
  display: none !important;
}

.header-section {
  font-size: 2.6rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color:var(--theme-main);
  margin-bottom: 1.1rem;
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}

.intro-text {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
}

/* styling for logo*/
.logo-img{
  padding:1rem;
  align-content: center;
}
.logo-img img {
  width: 150px;   
  height: auto;   
  object-fit: contain; 
  opacity: 1;
}

.logo-img img:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
  transition: transform 0.3s;
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.member-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 400px 710px;
  grid-template-rows: auto;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.member-grid-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0.5rem;
  padding-left: 0;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  overflow: hidden;
}


.profile-link {
  display: contents;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  height: 100%;
}


.member-grid-name {
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--bs-gray-700);
  margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
  line-height: 1.4;
  min-height: 2.9em;
  max-height: 4.2em;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  overflow: hidden;
}



.social-link {
  display: inline-flex;         
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.4rem;
  background: none;              
  box-shadow: none;               
  color: #2b864b;                 
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;              
  width: auto;                  
  height: auto;                 
  border: 1px solid #e3e7ed;                  
  border-radius: 4px;              
  padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem;                   
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: color 0.2s, border-color 0.2s;
}

.social-link i {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  line-height: 1;      
  margin: 0; 
}

.social-link:hover {
  background-color:rgba(43, 134, 75, 0.98);
  color: white;
  border-color: #2b864b;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}



.description-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
}

.description-text {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  overflow: hidden;
  max-height: calc(1.2rem * 1.85 * 5);
  width: 100%;
  text-align: justify;
}


hr {
    border: 0;
    height: 2px;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5));
    margin: 20px 0;
    grid-column: 1 / -1; 
  }

</style>
